strapiPost.title: Amplify Your Concert Experience At AMP Underground
strapiPost.content:
New this concert season, the Walmart AMP now offers ticketholders access to AMP Underground, an all-ages club located underneath Choctaw Plaza, including a private bar and limited food menu, lounge seating, live concert video and audio feed, and private restrooms.

  • First in line: The space opens 30 minutes before the main gates, giving priority entry into the venue, and closes one hour after the concert ends.
  • In the club: Tickets to AMP Underground must be purchased in addition to concert tickets and cost $49 per person, which covers access to the club plus two drinks and light snacks included.

Check out the remaining 2023 concert lineup and purchase ticket add-ons HERE.
